overview: Las Vegas is the city that never sleeps. But with beautiful showgirls, sultry lounge singers and strip clubs on every corner, who would want to? When one thinks of Vegas, they immediately get a vision of action and excitement; you can always find something going on 24 hours a day. As Wicked starlet Devinn Lane soon discovers, there is a lot of 'action' to be had in Vegas! With three lusty three-way scenes, plenty of girl/girl action and steamy boy/girl scenes, Vegas or Bust has it all to satisfy your every desire.Join Devinn Lane and her sexy co-stars, as they uncover all the pleasures Sin City has to offer.Vegas or Bust where every indulgence and fantasy comes to life. Cum along for the ride!
title: Vegas or Bust
